## PopulatableProtocol.borrowDebtToken() method

Adjust existing Trove by borrowing more DebtToken.

**Signature:**

```typescript
borrowDebtToken(amount: Decimalish, maxBorrowingRate?: Decimalish): Promise<PopulatedTransactionInterface<P, SentProtocolTransaction<S, ProtocolReceipt<R, TroveAdjustmentDetails>>>>;
```

